invalidRegistrationData: Invalid registration data. Provide email/password, idToken (Google), or Apple credentials
userNotFound: User not found. Please register first.
registrationSuccess: Registration successful. Please verify your email to activate your account
emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in
emailNotVerifiedForPasswordReset: Please verify your email before resetting your password
verificationTokenExpired: Verification link expired. Please request a new one.
resetEmailSent: If the email exists, a recovery link will be sent
termsNotAccepted: You must accept the terms and conditions
unauthorizedSourceBackoffice: Access denied. Only administrators can access the backoffice
unauthorizedSourceApp: Access denied. Only applicants and companies can access the app
unauthorizedSourceWebEmpresas: Access denied. Only companies can access this portal

emailPasswordReset.subject: Reset your TrabajoYa password
emailPasswordReset.preheader: Reset your TrabajoYa account password using the secure link
emailPasswordReset.title: Reset Password
emailPasswordReset.description: We received a request to reset the password for your account on
emailPasswordReset.descriptionCta: If you requested this change, click the button below to continue.
emailPasswordReset.temporaryLinkDesc: This link will expire in 1 hour for security
emailPasswordReset.accountSafeDesc: Your password will not change until you complete the process
emailPasswordReset.notYouDesc: If you didn't request this change, you can ignore this email
emailPasswordReset.warning: If you're having trouble or didn't request this change, contact us immediately to protect your account.
emailPasswordReset.footerAutoEmail: This email was sent automatically by TrabajoYa.
emailPasswordReset.footerIgnore: If you didn't request this change, you can ignore this message.
emailPasswordReset.textPlainExpiry: This link will expire in 1 hour for security
emailPasswordReset.textPlainIgnore: If you didn't request this change, you can ignore this email
emailPasswordReset.textPlainNoChange: Your password will not change until you complete the process
emailPasswordReset.textPlainContact: If you're having trouble or didn't request this change, contact us immediately at soporte@trabajo-ya.com

emailApplicationStatus.subject: Your application to "{jobTitle}" was updated: {statusLabel}
emailApplicationStatus.preheader: Your application to "{jobTitle}" at {companyName} has been updated to: {statusLabel}
emailApplicationStatus.title: Application Update
emailApplicationStatus.description: We want to let you know that the status of your application for the position
emailApplicationStatus.contactInfo: If you have any questions, you can contact the company directly through the platform.
emailApplicationStatus.footerAutoEmail: This email was sent automatically by TrabajoYa.
emailApplicationStatus.footerActiveApplication: You received this email because you have an active application.
emailApplicationStatus.statusReviewedDesc: Your application has been reviewed by the company.
emailApplicationStatus.statusInterviewDesc: The company wants to schedule an interview with you.
emailApplicationStatus.statusRejectedDesc: Unfortunately, your application was not selected for this opportunity.
emailApplicationStatus.statusDefaultDesc: Your application status has been updated.
emailApplicationStatus.textPlainContact: Need help? Contact us at soporte@trabajo-ya.com

emailJobApproval.subject: Your job posting "{jobTitle}" has been approved
emailJobApproval.preheader: Your job posting "{jobTitle}" has been approved and is now active on TrabajoYa
emailJobApproval.title: Job Posting Approved
emailJobApproval.description: We are pleased to inform you that your job posting
emailJobApproval.successDesc: Applicants can now see and apply to your job offer.
emailJobApproval.step2: Contact the candidates you're most interested in
emailJobApproval.step3: Manage your posting from your company dashboard
emailJobApproval.step4: Consider promoting your job for greater visibility
emailJobApproval.contactInfo: If you have any questions or need help, don't hesitate to contact us.
emailJobApproval.footerAutoEmail: This email was sent automatically by TrabajoYa.
emailJobApproval.textPlainContact: Need help? Contact us at soporte@trabajo-ya.com

emailVerification.subject: Verify your TrabajoYa account
emailVerification.preheader: Verify your email address to activate your TrabajoYa account
emailVerification.title: Welcome to TrabajoYa
emailVerification.description: Thank you for signing up at
emailVerification.descriptionCta: To complete your registration and start looking for job opportunities, we need to verify your email address.
emailVerification.benefitsTitle: Once verified, you'll be able to:
emailVerification.benefit1: Search and apply to job offers
emailVerification.benefit4: Connect with companies you're interested in
emailVerification.expirationDesc: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security. If you need a new link, you can request one from the app.
emailVerification.footerAutoEmail: This email was sent automatically by TrabajoYa.
emailVerification.footerIgnore: If you didn't sign up for TrabajoYa, you can ignore this message.
emailVerification.textPlainBenefits: Once verified, you'll be able to:
emailVerification.textPlainExpiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security.
emailVerification.textPlainContact: Need help? Contact us at soporte@trabajo-ya.com
